isolation level
Read commited
RC -> Release S after reading

Read repeatable
RP -> Does not release S after reading

CASE
lostupdate.sql
loadupdate_deadline.sql
tran1.sql
tran2.sql

1. Lost update: R R W W
2. Dirty read: R W Rb
3. Unrepeatable Read: R W W (delete) 
4. Phantom: R W W (insert)
5. Deadlock

show error message from SQL Server to UI


deadline: 2 transaction wait for lock from each other
